function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clarity on exposure time calculation method","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of occupant exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Specify the method for calculating exposure time in the model","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Model users, building occupants","Owner":"Model developers, building managers"},{"Description":"Unclear restrictions on building occupancy","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases transmission in overcrowded spaces","Mitigation":"Set clear limits on the maximum number of people allowed in the building","Technologies":"Occupancy management systems, crowd control technologies","People":"Building managers, facility owners","Owner":"Building managers, facility owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate information on maximum exposure time","Impact":"Inability to address prolonged exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Define clear criteria for maximum exposure time and its impact on disease transmission","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, ventilation control systems","People":"Health and safety regulators, building managers","Owner":"Health and safety regulators, building managers"}]}
